content.rendered: Along with the Nitrite-Free Turkey line, it is an undeniable best-seller. Customers with diet restrictions, allergies, or special food preferences can relish these with a full belly and no hurt feelings. Nitrite-Free, Gluten-Free, Lower Sodium, No MSG Added, Hormone and Antibiotic-Free. Honestly, could it get any better than this?
